topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d7e6d6368721bc9080200#post_552d7e6d6368721bc9080200
Having all men is sexist because there's no women 
Having mostly men is sexist because of tokenism and the perpetuation of rape culture
Having mostly women is sexist because it's fulfilling male sex fantasies
Having all women is fine unless men like it because men are invading women's safe spaces or the characters reveal more skin than their nose and eyeballs because it's objectifying women

[bq="trashboat"]"If FFXV is sexist for having all the main characters be boys, wouldn't stuff like Touhou be sexist for having an all female cast?"

Yes Tumblr is complaining about FFXV having an all male cast now.

What happened while I was gone?[/bq]
No; they just think touhou is "sexist" for being made by a man.

I feel as if My mom is just too good for me.

I haven't done anything to deserve such a kind woman as her. I'm not in school. I don't have a job. I sit in the house all day and I'm not productive.

All her hard work. And what have I done.
